title: Just a game...
body:
When someone goes AFK, feeds, or simply just doesnt care; that person ruins the match for everyone on their team. and one of the most used excuses is "its just a game who cares" or " doesnt matter its just a game". the thing is, personally i play this game to win, have fun, hang with friends or my wife, and have a good time. but when someone simply doesnt care about their team or if they feed/afk they take that away from me because it is a frustrating experience.

"its just a game"... what does that even mean??

because its just a game you arent trying to achieve the objective of winning? you arent trying to have good team work and pull off epic plays? i understand not taking a game seriously and destroying your comp for losing and things like that. but do you not play this game to win and have fun? i have lost games and still felt like i had a good time. the other team was more skilled or had more team work and so forth and i lost. as a matter of fact some of my best games have been losses. but if you troll your team you take that away.
